subject: Re: simulating textual user input
msgSnippet: Sorry, im not sure what exactly you mean, the class currently request information from the user via System.in.read(), are you saying that i should change this
messageBody:
Sorry, im not sure what exactly you mean, the class currently request
information from the user via System.in.read(), are you saying that i
should change this so that it actually requests the information from
a custom class such as Custom.read(), where I can fill in the
information from the testing class? Or have I missed the point?

Steve
